resources.string: Unable to show bank offices on map: no maps application found
Failed to refresh rates. Old rates will be shown.

App allows to quickly load the best exchange rates in the big cities of Belarus. By clicking on list item you can find nearest bank offices with best rates on the map. Please pay attention that info about exchange rates may be out of date. Please clarify in banks. Info about exchange rates provided by myfin.by
Currency rate was copied to clipboard
